name: Statrep
tagline: The StatRep package is a LaTeX package that provides two environments and two tags that work together to display your SAS code and results and to generate the SAS program that produces those results. The two environments (Datastep and Sascode) display SAS code. The two tags (Listing and Graphic) display SAS output.
body:
### Welcome to the StatRep Documentation.
The pdf documentation is the most complete; this page will get you started. See `statrepmanual.pdf` for full usage details and `statrep.pdf` for the implementation.

Getting started example coming soon.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
